options.name: Spellshot
options.description: When your Ranged Weapon is a Conduit, your Ray and Projectile spells that target a single Creature use your Ranged Attack modifier instead of your Spell Attack Modifier. Additionally, the Range of these spells is set to your Maximum Range for your Ranged Conduit.

options.name: Pure Shot
options.description: Gain +1 Damage with Ranged Weapons and +1 Maximum Range on all Ranged Weapons

options.name: Action : Arcane Blast
options.description: You target a point within 10 Units that you can see and make a Ranged Attack with your Spellshot Focus. All Creatures within a 2 Unit Radius of that point must make a Resistance Check against your Attack Roll or take 1d6 + your combined Ranged Damage and Spell Damage Bonus Modifier. The combined Damage Bonus is doubled on a True Hit.

options.name: Action : Heat Seaker
options.description: You make a Ranged Attack that is not affected by Cover at a Target you have seen in the past minute. The Targets Dodge Modifier cannot be used to attempt to avoid this Attack.

options.name: Action : Arcane Delivery
options.description: You Cast a Utility Spell that has a Channeling Time of 1 Action, but the Range becomes equal to that of your Spellshot Conduit. This Spell can only Target an Allied Creature.

options.name: Free Action : Ammo Infusion
options.description: When you successfully Channel a Projectile or Ray Spell through your Ranged Conduit, the Physical Damage from all other Ranged Attacks on this turn becomes the same Damage Type as the initial Spell.
